full_text: ** BELLSOUTH TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC. ** 561 832 4117 APR 05 2005 908 R CURRENT CHARGES WPB PAGE 6 BST ITEM CODES AMOUNT Messages (continued) BellSouth Answers plans fit your lifestyle Unlimited Local and Long Distance, International, Cingular Wireless, DIRECTV Service, and High-speed Internet. Now for a limited time you can enjoy greater savings on many of these services and take advantage of the added convenience of getting them all from one place. So bundle today and start saving. Call 1 866 740-9015 or visit bellsouth.com/value for more details. WANT A FASTER INTERNET? Step up from dial-up with BellSouth FastAccess DSL. You'll get instant connections, plus you can talk and surf on the same phone line. With download speeds much faster than any dial-up service, it's a great choice for fast e-mailing, Web surfing, online banking and shopping and much more! What's more, getting started is a breeze. Our user-friendly start-up kit makes installation quick and easy, so you'll be up and running in less than an hour. Plus, you'll get reliable service backed by our knowledgeable, live customer support staff 24/7. You'll be able to talk to a help desk representative anytime even CONTINUED 07/26/17 Page 30 of 104 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031647
